contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，行为不一致的路由器（例如，“随机”拒绝TC消息）可能会导致网络部分无法与网络其他部分通信。建议在所有参与路由器上实施一致的网络范围策略（例如，作为安全策略的一部分），“确定消息无效的其他原因”。

contents.text: 16.3.2. TC Message Processing Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.2. 消息处理定义

contents.text: When, according to Section 14.2, a TC message is to be "processed according to its type", this means that:
contents.zh-CHS: 根据第14.2节，当TC报文“根据其类型进行处理”时，这意味着：

contents.text: o If the TC message contains a Message TLV with Type = CONT_SEQ_NUM and Type Extension = COMPLETE, then processing according to Section 16.3.3 and then according to Section 16.3.4 is carried out.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果TC消息包含类型为CONT_SEQ_NUM且类型扩展为COMPLETE的消息TLV，则根据第16.3.3节和第16.3.4节进行处理。

contents.text: o If the TC message contains a Message TLV with Type = CONT_SEQ_NUM and Type Extension = INCOMPLETE, then only processing according to Section 16.3.3 is carried out.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果TC消息包含类型为CONT_SEQ_NUM且类型扩展名为complete的消息TLV，则仅执行第16.3.3节规定的处理。

contents.text: For the purposes of the TC message processing in Section 16.3.3 and Section 16.3.4:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于第16.3.3节和第16.3.4节中的TC消息处理：

contents.text: o "validity time" is calculated from a VALIDITY_TIME Message TLV in the TC message according to the specification in [RFC5497]. All information in the TC message has the same validity time.
contents.zh-CHS: o 根据[RFC5497]中的规范，根据TC消息中的有效时间消息TLV计算“有效时间”。TC报文中的所有信息具有相同的有效期。

contents.text: o "received ANSN" is defined as being the value of a Message TLV with Type = CONT_SEQ_NUM.
contents.zh-CHS: o “接收到的ANSN”定义为类型为CONT_SEQ_NUM的消息TLV的值。

contents.text: o "associated metric value" is defined for any address in the TC message as being either the outgoing neighbor metric value indicated by a TLV with Type = LINK_METRIC and Type Extension = LINK_METRIC_TYPE that is associated with any address object in the TC message that is equal to that address or as UNKNOWN_METRIC otherwise. (Note that the rules in Section 16.3.1 make this definition unambiguous.)
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于TC消息中的任何地址，“关联度量值”定义为TLV指示的传出邻居度量值，该TLV的类型=LINK\u metric，类型扩展=LINK\u metric\u Type与TC消息中与该地址相等的任何地址对象关联，否则定义为未知\u metric。（请注意，第16.3.1节中的规则明确了该定义。）

contents.text: o Comparisons of sequence numbers are carried out as specified in Section 21.
contents.zh-CHS: o 按照第21节的规定对序列号进行比较。

contents.text: 16.3.3. Initial TC Message Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.3. 初始TC消息处理

contents.text: The TC message is processed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: TC消息的处理如下所示：

contents.text: 1. The Advertising Remote Router Set is updated according to Section 16.3.3.1. If the TC message is indicated as discarded in that processing, then the following steps are not carried out.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 根据第16.3.3.1节更新广告远程路由器集。如果TC消息在该处理中被指示为已丢弃，则不执行以下步骤。

contents.text: 2. The Router Topology Set is updated according to Section 16.3.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 路由器拓扑集根据第16.3.3.2节进行更新。

contents.text: 3. The Routable Address Topology Set is updated according to Section 16.3.3.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 可路由地址拓扑集根据第16.3.3.3节进行更新。

contents.text: 4. The Attached Network Set is updated according to Section 16.3.3.4.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 根据第16.3.3.4节更新连接的网络集。

contents.text: 16.3.3.1. Populating the Advertising Remote Router Set
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.3.1. 填充广告远程路由器集

contents.text: The router MUST update its Advertising Remote Router Set as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器必须更新其广告远程路由器集，如下所示：

contents.text: 1. If there is an Advertising Remote Router Tuple with:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 如果存在具有以下内容的广告远程路由器元组：

contents.text: * AR_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * AR_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: * AR_seq_number > received ANSN,
contents.zh-CHS: * 应收序号>收到的ANSN，

contents.text: then the TC message MUST be discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 然后必须丢弃TC消息。

contents.text: 2. Otherwise:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 否则：

contents.text: 1. If there is no Advertising Remote Router Tuple such that:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 如果没有广告远程路由器元组，则：

contents.text: + AR_orig_addr = message originator address;
contents.zh-CHS: + AR_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；

contents.text: then create an Advertising Remote Router Tuple with:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后使用以下内容创建广告远程路由器元组：

contents.text: + AR_orig_addr := message originator address.
contents.zh-CHS: + AR_orig_addr:=消息发起人地址。

contents.text: 2. This Advertising Remote Router Tuple (existing or new) is then modified as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 然后将此远程路由器元组（现有或新）修改如下：

contents.text: + AR_seq_number := received ANSN;
contents.zh-CHS: + 应收序号：=收到的ANSN；

contents.text: + AR_time := current time + validity time.
contents.zh-CHS: + 应收账款时间：=当前时间+有效期时间。

contents.text: 16.3.3.2. Populating the Router Topology Set
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.3.2. 填充路由器拓扑集

contents.text: The router MUST update its Router Topology Set as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器必须更新其路由器拓扑集，如下所示：

contents.text: 1. For each address (henceforth, advertised address) that corresponds to one or more address objects with an associated Address Block TLV with Type = NBR_ADDR_TYPE and Value = ORIGINATOR or Value = ROUTABLE_ORIG and that is not partially owned by this router, perform the following processing:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 对于与一个或多个地址对象相对应且具有类型为NBR\U ADDR\U Type且值为发起者或值为可路由\U ORIG的关联地址块TLV且不部分归此路由器所有的每个地址（此后称为播发地址），执行以下处理：

contents.text: 1. If the associated metric is UNKNOWN_METRIC, then remove any Router Topology Tuple such that:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 如果关联的度量为未知度量，则删除任何路由器拓扑元组，以便：

contents.text: + TR_from_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_from_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: + TR_to_orig_addr = advertised address.
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_to_orig_addr=广告地址。

contents.text: 2. Otherwise, if there is no Router Topology Tuple such that:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 否则，如果没有路由器拓扑元组，则：

contents.text: + TR_from_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_from_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: + TR_to_orig_addr = advertised address,
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_to_orig_addr=广告地址，

contents.text: then create a new Router Topology Tuple with:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后使用以下内容创建新的路由器拓扑元组：

contents.text: + TR_from_orig_addr := message originator address;
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_from_orig_addr:=消息发起人地址；

contents.text: + TR_to_orig_addr := advertised address.
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_to_orig_addr:=广告地址。

contents.text: 3. This Router Topology Tuple (existing or new) is then modified as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 该路由器拓扑元组（现有或新）随后修改如下：

contents.text: + TR_seq_number := received ANSN;
contents.zh-CHS: + TR序列号：=收到的ANSN；

contents.text: + TR_metric := associated link metric;
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_度量：=关联链路度量；

contents.text: + TR_time := current time + validity time.
contents.zh-CHS: + TR_时间：=当前时间+有效时间。

contents.text: 16.3.3.3. Populating the Routable Address Topology Set
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.3.3. 填充可路由地址拓扑集

contents.text: The router MUST update its Routable Address Topology Set as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器必须更新其可路由地址拓扑集，如下所示：

contents.text: 1. For each network address (henceforth, advertised address) that corresponds to one or more address objects with an associated Address Block TLV with Type = NBR_ADDR_TYPE and Value = ROUTABLE or Value = ROUTABLE_ORIG and that is not partially owned by this router, perform the following processing:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 对于与一个或多个地址对象相对应的每个网络地址（此后称为播发地址），该地址对象具有类型为NBR\U ADDR\U Type且值为ROUTABLE或值为ROUTABLE\U ORIG的关联地址块TLV，且该地址不部分归该路由器所有，请执行以下处理：

contents.text: 1. If the associated metric is UNKNOWN_METRIC, then remove any Routable Address Topology Tuple such that:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 如果关联的度量为未知度量，则删除任何可路由地址拓扑元组，以便：

contents.text: + TA_from_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_from_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: + TA_dest_addr = advertised address.
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_dest_addr=广告地址。

contents.text: 2. Otherwise, if there is no Routable Address Topology Tuple such that:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 否则，如果不存在可路由地址拓扑元组，则：

contents.text: + TA_from_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_from_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: + TA_dest_addr = advertised address,
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_dest_addr=广告地址，

contents.text: then create a new Routable Address Topology Tuple with:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后使用以下内容创建新的可路由地址拓扑元组：

contents.text: + TA_from_orig_addr := message originator address;
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_from_orig_addr:=消息发起人地址；

contents.text: + TA_dest_addr := advertised address.
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_dest_addr:=广告地址。

contents.text: 3. This Routable Address Topology Tuple (existing or new) is then modified as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 然后，将此可路由地址拓扑元组（现有或新）修改如下：

contents.text: + TA_seq_number := received ANSN;
contents.zh-CHS: + TA序列号：=收到的ANSN；

contents.text: + TA_metric := associated link metric;
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_度量：=关联链路度量；

contents.text: + TA_time := current time + validity time.
contents.zh-CHS: + TA_时间：=当前时间+有效时间。

contents.text: 16.3.3.4. Populating the Attached Network Set
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.3.4. 填充连接的网络集

contents.text: The router MUST update its Attached Network Set as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器必须更新其连接的网络集，如下所示：

contents.text: 1. For each network address (henceforth, attached address) that corresponds to one or more address objects with an associated Address Block TLV with Type = GATEWAY and that is not fully owned by this router, perform the following processing:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 对于与一个或多个地址对象相对应的每个网络地址（此后称为附加地址），该地址对象具有类型为GATEWAY的关联地址块TLV，且不完全归该路由器所有，请执行以下处理：

contents.text: 1. If the associated metric is UNKNOWN_METRIC, then remove any Attached Network Tuple such that:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 如果关联的度量为未知度量，则删除任何附加的网络元组，以便：

contents.text: + AN_net_addr = attached address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: + a_net_addr=附加地址；和

contents.text: + AN_orig_addr = message originator address.
contents.zh-CHS: + a_orig_addr=消息发起人地址。

contents.text: 2. Otherwise, if there is no Attached Network Tuple such that:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 否则，如果没有连接的网络元组，则：

contents.text: + AN_net_addr = attached address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: + a_net_addr=附加地址；和

contents.text: + AN_orig_addr = message originator address,
contents.zh-CHS: + a_orig_addr=消息发起人地址，

contents.text: then create a new Attached Network Tuple with:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后使用以下内容创建新的连接网络元组：

contents.text: + AN_net_addr := attached address;
contents.zh-CHS: + 地址：=附加地址；

contents.text: + AN_orig_addr := message originator address.
contents.zh-CHS: + 原始地址：=消息发起人地址。

contents.text: 3. This Attached Network Tuple (existing or new) is then modified as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 然后将此附加的网络元组（现有或新）修改如下：

contents.text: + AN_seq_number := received ANSN;
contents.zh-CHS: + 序号：=接收到的ANSN；

contents.text: + AN_dist := the Value of the associated GATEWAY TLV;
contents.zh-CHS: + AN_dist:=关联网关TLV的值；

contents.text: + AN_metric := associated link metric;
contents.zh-CHS: + a_度量：=关联的链路度量；

contents.text: + AN_time := current time + validity time.
contents.zh-CHS: + AN_时间：=当前时间+有效时间。

contents.text: 16.3.4. Completing TC Message Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.4. 完成TC消息处理

contents.text: The TC message is processed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: TC消息的处理如下所示：

contents.text: 1. The Router Topology Set is updated according to Section 16.3.4.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 路由器拓扑集根据第16.3.4.1节进行更新。

contents.text: 2. The Routable Address Topology Set is updated according to Section 16.3.4.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 可路由地址拓扑集根据第16.3.4.2节进行更新。

contents.text: 3. The Attached Network Set is updated according to Section 16.3.4.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 根据第16.3.4.3节更新连接的网络集。

contents.text: 16.3.4.1. Purging the Router Topology Set
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.4.1. 清除路由器拓扑集

contents.text: The Router Topology Set MUST be updated as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 必须按如下方式更新路由器拓扑集：

contents.text: 1. Any Router Topology Tuples with:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 任何路由器拓扑元组具有：

contents.text: * TR_from_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * TR_from_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: * TR_seq_number < received ANSN,
contents.zh-CHS: * TR序列号<收到的ANSN，

contents.text: MUST be removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须删除。

contents.text: 16.3.4.2. Purging the Routable Address Topology Set
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.4.2. 清除可路由地址拓扑集

contents.text: The Routable Address Topology Set MUST be updated as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 必须按如下方式更新可路由地址拓扑集：

contents.text: 1. Any Routable Address Topology Tuples with:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 具有以下内容的任何可路由地址拓扑元组：

contents.text: * TA_from_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * TA_from_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: * TA_seq_number < received ANSN,
contents.zh-CHS: * TA序列号<收到的ANSN，

contents.text: MUST be removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须删除。

contents.text: 16.3.4.3. Purging the Attached Network Set
contents.zh-CHS: 16.3.4.3. 清除连接的网络集

contents.text: The Attached Network Set MUST be updated as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 必须按以下方式更新连接的网络集：

contents.text: 1. Any Attached Network Tuples with:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 任何连接的网络元组具有：

contents.text: * AN_orig_addr = message originator address; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * a_orig_addr=消息发起人地址；和

contents.text: * AN_seq_number < received ANSN,
contents.zh-CHS: * 序列号<接收到的ANSN，

contents.text: MUST be removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须删除。

contents.text: 17. Information Base Changes
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 信息库的变化

contents.text: The changes described in the following sections MUST be carried out when any Information Base changes as indicated.
contents.zh-CHS: 当任何信息库发生如图所示的更改时，必须执行以下章节中描述的更改。

contents.text: 17.1. Originator Address Changes
contents.zh-CHS: 17.1. 发起人地址更改

contents.text: If the router changes its originator address, then:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果路由器更改其发起者地址，则：

contents.text: 1. If there is no Originator Tuple with:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 如果没有具有以下内容的发起人元组：

contents.text: * O_orig_addr = old originator address
contents.zh-CHS: * O_orig_addr=原发起人地址

contents.text: then create an Originator Tuple with:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后使用以下内容创建一个发起人元组：

contents.text: * O_orig_addr := old originator address
contents.zh-CHS: * O_orig_addr:=原发起人地址

contents.text: The Originator Tuple (existing or new) with:
contents.zh-CHS: 具有以下内容的发起人元组（现有或新）：

contents.text: * O_orig_addr = new originator address
contents.zh-CHS: * O_orig_addr=新的发起人地址

contents.text: is then modified as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 然后修改如下：

contents.text: * O_time := current time + O_HOLD_TIME
contents.zh-CHS: * O_时间：=当前时间+O_保持时间

contents.text: 17.2. Link State Changes
contents.zh-CHS: 17.2. 链路状态更改

contents.text: The consistency of a Link Tuple MUST be maintained according to the following rules, in addition to those in [RFC6130]:
contents.zh-CHS: 除了[RFC6130]中的规则外，还必须根据以下规则维护链接元组的一致性：

contents.text: o If L_status = HEARD or L_status = SYMMETRIC, then L_in_metric MUST be set (by a process outside this specification).
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果L_status=hear或L_status=SYMMETRIC，则必须设置L_in_度量（通过本规范之外的过程）。

contents.text: o If L_status != SYMMETRIC, then set L_mpr_selector := false.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果L_状态！=对称，然后设置L_mpr_选择器：=false。

contents.text: o If L_out_metric = UNKNOWN_METRIC, then L_status MUST NOT equal SYMMETRIC; set L_SYM_time := EXPIRED if this would otherwise be the case.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果L_out_metric=未知_metric，则L_状态不得等于对称；设置L_SYM_time:=如果不是这样，则过期。

contents.text: 17.3. Neighbor State Changes
contents.zh-CHS: 17.3. 相邻状态变化

contents.text: The consistency of a Neighbor Tuple MUST be maintained according to the following rules, in addition to those in [RFC6130]:
contents.zh-CHS: 除[RFC6130]中的规则外，必须根据以下规则维护相邻元组的一致性：

contents.text: 1. If N_symmetric = true, then N_in_metric MUST equal the minimum value of all L_in_metric of corresponding Link Tuples with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC. If there are no such Link Tuples, then N_in_metric MUST equal UNKNOWN_METRIC.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 如果N_symmetric=true，则N_in_度量必须等于具有L_status=symmetric和L_in_度量！=未知度量。如果没有这样的链接元组，那么N_in_度量必须等于UNKNOWN_度量。

contents.text: 2. If N_symmetric = true, then N_out_metric MUST equal the minimum value of all L_out_metric of corresponding Link Tuples with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC. If there are no such Link Tuples, then N_out_metric MUST equal UNKNOWN_METRIC.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 如果N_symmetric=true，则N_out_metric必须等于具有L_status=symmetric和L_out_metric！=未知度量。如果没有这样的链接元组，那么N_out_度量必须等于UNKNOWN_度量。

contents.text: 3. If N_symmetric = false, then N_flooding_mpr, N_routing_mpr, N_mpr_selector, and N_advertised MUST all be equal to false.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 如果N_symmetric=false，则N_flooding\u mpr、N_routing\u mpr、N_mpr\u selector和N_advised都必须等于false。

contents.text: 4. If N_mpr_selector = true, then N_advertised MUST be equal to true.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 如果N_mpr_selector=true，则N_advised必须等于true。

contents.text: 5. If N_symmetric = true, N_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC and N_mpr_selector = false, then a router MAY select N_advertised = true or N_advertised = false. The more neighbors that are advertised, the larger TC messages become, but the more redundancy is available for routing. A router SHOULD consider the nature of its network in making such a decision and SHOULD avoid unnecessary changes in advertising status, which may result in unnecessary changes to routing.
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 如果N_symmetric=true，则N_out_metric！=未知度量和N_mpr_选择器=false，则路由器可以选择N_广告=true或N_广告=false。播发的邻居越多，TC消息越大，但路由可用的冗余越多。路由器应该考虑其网络的性质来做出这样的决定，并且应该避免不必要的广告状态改变，这可能导致路由的不必要的改变。

contents.text: 17.4. Advertised Neighbor Changes
contents.zh-CHS: 17.4. 公布的邻居更改

contents.text: The router MUST increment the ANSN in the Neighbor Information Base whenever:
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器必须在以下情况下增加邻居信息库中的ANSN：

contents.text: 1. Any Neighbor Tuple changes its N_advertised value, or any Neighbor Tuple with N_advertised = true is removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 任何邻居元组都会更改其N_播发值，或者删除任何N_播发=true的邻居元组。

contents.text: 2. Any Neighbor Tuple with N_advertised = true changes its N_orig_addr or has any routable address added to or removed from N_neighbor_addr_list.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 任何N_advised=true的邻居元组都会更改其N_orig_addr，或者在N_Neighbor_addr_列表中添加或删除任何可路由地址。

contents.text: 3. Any Neighbor Tuple with N_advertised = true has N_out_metric changed.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. N_advised=true的任何相邻元组的N_out_度量都已更改。

contents.text: 4. There is any change to the Local Attached Network Set.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 本地连接的网络集有任何更改。

contents.text: 17.5. Advertising Remote Router Tuple Expires
contents.zh-CHS: 17.5. 播发远程路由器元组过期

contents.text: The Router Topology Set, the Routable Address Topology Set, and the Attached Network Set MUST be changed when an Advertising Remote Router Tuple expires (AR_time is reached). The following changes are required before the Advertising Remote Router Tuple is removed:
contents.zh-CHS: 当广告远程路由器元组过期（达到AR_时间）时，必须更改路由器拓扑集、可路由地址拓扑集和连接的网络集。删除播发远程路由器元组之前，需要进行以下更改：

contents.text: 1. All Router Topology Tuples with:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 所有路由器拓扑元组具有：

contents.text: * TR_from_orig_addr = AR_orig_addr of the Advertising Remote Router Tuple
contents.zh-CHS: * TR_from_orig_addr=广告远程路由器元组的AR_orig_addr

contents.text: are removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 被移除。

contents.text: 2. All Routable Address Topology Tuples with:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 具有以下内容的所有可路由地址拓扑元组：

contents.text: * TA_from_orig_addr = AR_orig_addr of the Advertising Remote Router Tuple
contents.zh-CHS: * TA_from_orig_addr=广告远程路由器元组的AR_orig_addr

contents.text: are removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 被移除。

contents.text: 3. All Attached Network Tuples with:
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 所有连接的网络元组具有：

contents.text: * AN_orig_addr = AR_orig_addr of the Advertising Remote Router Tuple
contents.zh-CHS: * a_orig_addr=广告远程路由器元组的AR_orig_addr

contents.text: are removed.
contents.zh-CHS: 被移除。

contents.text: 17.6. Neighborhood Changes and MPR Updates
contents.zh-CHS: 17.6. 邻域更改和MPR更新

contents.text: The sets of symmetric 1-hop neighbors selected as flooding MPRs and routing MPRs MUST satisfy the conditions defined in Section 18. To ensure this:
contents.zh-CHS: 选择作为泛洪MPR和路由MPR的对称1跳邻居集必须满足第18节中定义的条件。为确保这一点：

contents.text: 1. The set of flooding MPRs of a router MUST be recalculated if:
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 在以下情况下，必须重新计算路由器的泛洪MPR集：

contents.text: * A Link Tuple is added with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 添加一个链接元组，其中L_status=对称，L_out_metric！=未知度量；或

contents.text: * A Link Tuple with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC is removed; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * L_status=对称且L_out_度量！=删除未知的_度量；或

contents.text: * A Link Tuple with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC changes to having L_status = HEARD, L_status = LOST, or L_out_metric = UNKNOWN_METRIC; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * L_status=对称且L_out_度量！=未知度量更改为L_状态=听到，L_状态=丢失，或L_输出度量=未知度量；或

contents.text: * A Link Tuple with L_status = HEARD or L_status = LOST changes to having L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * L_status=hear或L_status=LOST的链接元组更改为L_status=SYMMETRIC和L_out_metric！=未知度量；或

contents.text: * The flooding MPR selection process uses metric values (see Section 18.4) and the L_out_metric of any Link Tuple with L_status = SYMMETRIC changes; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 泛洪MPR选择过程使用度量值（见第18.4节）和L_状态=对称更改的任何链接元组的L_out_度量；或

contents.text: * The N_will_flooding of a Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true and N_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC changes from WILL_NEVER to any other value; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_将对N_symmetric=true和N_out_metric！=未知度量从WILL\u NEVER更改为任何其他值；或

contents.text: * The N_will_flooding of a Neighbor Tuple with N_flooding_mpr = true changes to WILL_NEVER from any other value; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_will_对相邻元组的泛洪，N_flooding_mpr=从任何其他值到will_的真实更改；或

contents.text: * The N_will_flooding of a Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true, N_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC, and N_flooding_mpr = false changes to WILL_ALWAYS from any other value; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_将对N_symmetric=true，N_out_metric！=未知度量，N\u flooding\u mpr=从任何其他值对WILL\u的错误更改；或

contents.text: * A 2-Hop Tuple with N2_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC is added or removed; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 具有N2_out_度量的两跳元组！=添加或删除未知的_度量；或

contents.text: * The N2_out_metric of any 2-Hop Tuple changes and either the flooding MPR selection process uses metric values (see Section 18.4) or the change is to or from UNKNOWN_METRIC.
contents.zh-CHS: * 任何2跳元组的N2_out_度量发生变化，泛洪MPR选择过程使用度量值（参见第18.4节），或者更改为未知_度量或来自未知_度量。

contents.text: 2. Otherwise, the set of flooding MPRs of a router MAY be recalculated if the N_will_flooding of a Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true changes in any other way; it SHOULD be recalculated if N_flooding_mpr = false and this is an increase in N_will_flooding or if N_flooding_mpr = true and this is a decrease in N_will_flooding.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 否则，如果N_将以任何其他方式对N_symmetric＝true的邻居元组进行N_泛洪，则可以重新计算路由器的泛洪mpr集合；如果N_flooding_mpr=false，这是N_will_flooding的增加，或者如果N_flooding_mpr=true，这是N_will_flooding的减少，则应重新计算。

contents.text: 3. The set of routing MPRs of a router MUST be recalculated if:
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 在以下情况下，必须重新计算路由器的路由MPR集：

contents.text: * A Neighbor Tuple is added with N_symmetric = true and N_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 使用N_symmetric=true和N_in_metric！=未知度量；或

contents.text: * A Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true and N_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC is removed; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_对称=真且N_in_度量！=删除未知的_度量；或

contents.text: * A Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true and N_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC changes to having N_symmetric = false; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_对称=真且N_in_度量！=未知度量更改为N_对称=false；或

contents.text: * A Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = false changes to having N_symmetric = true and N_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_symmetric=false的相邻元组更改为N_symmetric=true和N_in_metric！=未知度量；或

contents.text: * The N_in_metric of any Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true changes; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_对称=真变化的任何相邻元组的N_in_度量；或

contents.text: * The N_will_routing of a Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true and N_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC changes from WILL_NEVER to any other value; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_将路由N_对称=真且N_in_度量！=未知度量从WILL\u NEVER更改为任何其他值；或

contents.text: * The N_will_routing of a Neighbor Tuple with N_routing_mpr = true changes to WILL_NEVER from any other value; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 相邻元组的N_will_路由，N_routing_mpr=从任何其他值更改为will_NEVER；或

contents.text: * The N_will_routing of a Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true, N_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC and N_routing_mpr = false changes to WILL_ALWAYS from any other value; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * N_将对N_symmetric=true，N_in_metric！=未知度量和N\u路由\u mpr=从任何其他值对WILL\u的错误更改；或

contents.text: * A 2-Hop Tuple with N2_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC is added or removed; OR
contents.zh-CHS: * 具有N2_in_度量的两跳元组！=添加或删除未知的_度量；或

contents.text: * The N2_in_metric of any 2-Hop Tuple changes.
contents.zh-CHS: * 任何2跳元组的N2_in_度量都会更改。

contents.text: 4. Otherwise, the set of routing MPRs of a router MAY be recalculated if the N_will_routing of a Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true changes in any other way; it SHOULD be recalculated if N_routing_mpr = false and this is an increase in N_will_routing or if N_routing_mpr = true and this is a decrease in N_will_routing.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 否则，如果N_将以任何其他方式改变N_symmetric＝true的邻居元组的N_路由，则可以重新计算路由器的路由mpr集合；如果N_routing_mpr=false，这是N_will_routing的增加，或者如果N_routing_mpr=true，这是N_will_routing的减少，则应重新计算。

contents.text: If either set of MPRs of a router is recalculated, this MUST be as described in Section 18.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果重新计算路由器的任一组MPR，则必须如第18节所述。

contents.text: 17.7. Routing Set Updates
contents.zh-CHS: 17.7. 路由集更新

contents.text: The Routing Set MUST be updated, as described in Section 19, when changes in the Local Information Base, the Neighborhood Information Base, or the Topology Information Base indicate a change (including of any potentially used outgoing neighbor metric values) of the known symmetric links and/or attached networks in the MANET, hence changing the Topology Graph. It is sufficient to consider only changes that affect at least one of:
contents.zh-CHS: 如第19节所述，当本地信息库、邻域信息库或拓扑信息库中的更改指示MANET中已知对称链路和/或连接网络的更改（包括任何潜在使用的传出邻居度量值）时，必须更新路由集，因此更改拓扑图。仅考虑影响至少一个的变化是足够的：

contents.text: o The Local Interface Set for an OLSRv2 interface, if the change removes any network address in an I_local_iface_addr_list. In this case, unless the OLSRv2 interface is removed, it may not be necessary to do more than replace such network addresses, if used, by an alternative network address from the same I_local_iface_addr_list.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果更改删除了I_Local_iface_addr_列表中的任何网络地址，则为OLSRv2接口设置的本地接口。在这种情况下，除非移除OLSRv2接口，否则可能只需将这些网络地址（如果使用）替换为同一I_local_iface_addr_列表中的替代网络地址即可。

contents.text: o The Local Attached Set, if the change removes any AL_net_addr that is also an AN_net_addr. In this case, it may not be necessary to do more than add Routing Tuples with R_dest_addr equal to that AN_net_addr.
contents.zh-CHS: o 本地附加集，如果更改删除了任何也是an_net_addr的AL_net_addr。在这种情况下，可能只需要添加路由元组，其中R_dest_addr等于a_net_addr。

contents.text: o The Link Set of any OLSRv2 interface, considering only Link Tuples that have, or just had, L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC (including removal of such Link Tuples).
contents.zh-CHS: o 任何OLSRv2接口的链接集，仅考虑具有或刚刚具有L_status=对称和L_out_度量的链接元组！=未知_度量（包括删除此类链接元组）。

contents.text: o The Neighbor Set of the router, considering only Neighbor Tuples that have, or just had, N_symmetric = true and N_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC and do not have N_orig_addr = unknown.
contents.zh-CHS: o 路由器的邻居集，仅考虑具有或刚刚具有N_symmetric=true和N_out_metric！=未知度量，并且没有N\u orig\u addr=未知。

contents.text: o The 2-Hop Set of any OLSRv2 interface, if used in the creation of the Routing Set and if the change affects any 2-Hop Tuples with N2_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC.
contents.zh-CHS: o 任何OLSRv2接口的2跳集，如果在创建路由集时使用，并且如果更改影响具有N2_out_度量的任何2跳元组！=未知度量。

contents.text: o The Router Topology Set of the router.
contents.zh-CHS: o 路由器的路由器拓扑集。

contents.text: o The Routable Address Topology Set of the router.
contents.zh-CHS: o 路由器的可路由地址拓扑集。

contents.text: o The Attached Network Set of the router.
contents.zh-CHS: o 路由器的连接网络集。

contents.text: 18. Selecting MPRs
contents.zh-CHS: 18. 选择MPR

contents.text: Each router MUST select, from among its willing symmetric 1-hop neighbors, two subsets of these routers, as flooding and routing MPRs. This selection is recorded in the router's Neighbor Set and reported in the router's HELLO messages. Routers MAY select their MPRs by any process that satisfies the conditions that follow, which may, but need not, use the organization of the data described. Routers can freely interoperate whether they use the same or different MPR selection algorithms.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个路由器必须从其自愿的对称1跳邻居中选择这些路由器的两个子集，作为泛洪和路由MPR。此选择记录在路由器的邻居集中，并在路由器的HELLO消息中报告。路由器可以通过满足以下条件的任何过程来选择其mpr，该过程可以但不必使用所描述的数据组织。路由器可以自由地进行互操作，无论它们使用相同或不同的MPR选择算法。

contents.text: Only flooding MPRs forward control messages flooded through the MANET, thus effecting a flooding reduction, an optimization of the flooding mechanism, known as MPR flooding. Routing MPRs are used to effect a topology reduction in the MANET. (If no such reduction is required, then a router can select all of its relevant neighbors as routing MPRs.) Consequently, while it is not essential that these two sets of MPRs are minimal, keeping the numbers of MPRs small ensures that the overhead of this protocol is kept to a minimum.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有泛洪MPR前向控制消息通过MANET泛洪，从而实现泛洪减少，这是对泛洪机制的优化，称为MPR泛洪。路由MPR用于减少MANET中的拓扑结构。（如果不需要这样的减少，那么路由器可以选择其所有相关的邻居作为路由mpr。）因此，虽然这两组mpr不一定是最小的，但保持mpr的数量小可以确保将该协议的开销保持在最小。

contents.text: 18.1. Overview
MPRs are selected according to the following steps, defined in the following sections:
contents.zh-CHS: MPR根据以下章节中定义的以下步骤进行选择：

contents.text: o A data structure known as a Neighbor Graph is defined.
contents.zh-CHS: o 定义了称为邻居图的数据结构。

contents.text: o The properties of an MPR Set derived from a Neighbor Graph are defined. Any algorithm that creates an MPR Set that satisfies these properties is a valid MPR selection algorithm. An example algorithm that creates such an MPR Set is given in Appendix B.
contents.zh-CHS: o 定义了由邻域图导出的MPR集的性质。任何创建满足这些属性的MPR集的算法都是有效的MPR选择算法。附录B中给出了创建此类MPR集的示例算法。

contents.text: o How to create a Neighbor Graph for each interface based on the corresponding Interface Information Base is defined, and how to combine the resulting MPR Sets to determine the router's flooding MPRs and record those in the router's Neighbor Set are described.
contents.zh-CHS: o 定义了如何基于相应的接口信息库为每个接口创建一个邻居图，并描述了如何组合生成的MPR集来确定路由器的泛洪MPR并将其记录在路由器的邻居集中。

contents.text: o How to create a single Neighbor Graph based on all Interface Information Bases and the Neighbor Information Base is defined, and how to record the resulting MPR Set as the router's routing MPRs in the router's Neighbor Set is described.
contents.zh-CHS: o 描述了如何基于所有接口信息库和邻居信息库创建单个邻居图，以及如何将生成的MPR集作为路由器的路由MPR记录在路由器的邻居集中。

contents.text: o A specification as to when MPRs MUST be calculated is given.
contents.zh-CHS: o 给出了何时必须计算MPR的规范。

contents.text: When a router selects its MPRs, it MAY consider any characteristics of its neighbors that it is aware of. In particular, it SHOULD consider the willingness of the neighbor, as recorded by the corresponding N_will_flooding or N_will_routing value, as appropriate, preferring neighbors with higher values. (Note that willingness values equal to WILL_NEVER and WILL_ALWAYS are always considered, as described.) However, a router MAY consider other characteristics to have a greater significance.
contents.zh-CHS: 当路由器选择它的MPR时，它可以考虑它所知道的邻居的任何特性。特别是，它应该考虑邻居的意愿，如相应的N-WyRay-Pur淹y或N-Wyl路由选择值所记录的，适当地，优选具有较高值的邻居。（注意，意愿值总是等于Wray-No.and Wele-总是被考虑，如所描述的）然而，路由器可以考虑其他特征具有更大的意义。

contents.text: Each router MAY select its flooding and routing MPRs independently of each other or coordinate its selections. A router MAY make its MPR selections independently of the MPR selection by other routers, or it MAY, for example, give preference to routers that either are, or are not, already selected as MPRs by other routers.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个路由器可以彼此独立地选择其泛洪和路由mpr，或者协调其选择。路由器可以独立于其他路由器的MPR选择而进行其MPR选择，或者例如，它可以优先选择已经或没有被其他路由器选择为MPR的路由器。

contents.text: 18.2. Neighbor Graph

A Neighbor Graph is a structure defined here as consisting of sets N1 and N2 and some associated metric and willingness values. Elements of set N1 represent willing symmetric 1-hop neighbors, and elements of set N2 represent addresses of a symmetric 2-hop neighbor.
contents.zh-CHS: 邻域图是这里定义的一种结构，由集合N1和N2以及一些相关的度量值和意愿值组成。集合N1的元素表示对称1跳邻居，集合N2的元素表示对称2跳邻居的地址。

contents.text: A Neighbor Graph has the following properties:
contents.zh-CHS: 邻居图具有以下属性：

contents.text: o It contains two disjoint sets N1 and N2.
contents.zh-CHS: o 它包含两个不相交的集合N1和N2。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, there is an associated willingness value W(x) such that WILL_NEVER < W(x) <= WILL_ALWAYS.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，都有一个相关的意愿值W（x），使得永远不会<W（x）<=永远。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, there is an associated metric d1(x) > 0.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，有一个相关的度量d1（x）>0。

contents.text: o For some elements y in N2, there is an associated metric d1(y) > 0. (Other elements y in N2 have undefined d1(y); this may be considered to be infinite.)
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N2中的某些元素y，有一个相关的度量d1（y）>0。（N2中的其他元素y具有未定义的d1（y）；这可能被认为是无限的。）

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, there is a subset N2(x) of elements of N2; this subset may be empty. For each x in N1 and each y in N2(x), there is an associated metric d2(x,y) > 0. (For other x in N1 and y in N2, d2(x,y) is undefined and may be considered infinite.)
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，存在N2元素的子集N2（x）；此子集可能为空。对于N1中的每个x和N2（x）中的每个y，有一个关联的度量d2（x，y）>0。（对于N1中的其他x和N2中的y，d2（x，y）未定义，可以认为是无限的。）

contents.text: o N2 is equal to the union of all the N2(x) for all x in N1, i.e., for each y in N2, there is at least one x in N1 such that y is in N2(x).
contents.zh-CHS: o N2等于N1中所有x的所有N2（x）的并集，即，对于N2中的每个y，N1中至少有一个x，使得y在N2（x）中。

contents.text: It is convenient to also define:
contents.zh-CHS: 还可以方便地定义：

contents.text: o For each y in N2, the set N1(y) that contains x in N1 if and only if y is in N2(x). From the final property above, N1(y) is not empty.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N2中的每个y，当且仅当y在N2（x）中时，集合N1（y）中包含x。从上面的最后一个属性来看，N1（y）不是空的。

contents.text: o For each x in N1 and y in N2, if d2(x,y) is defined, then d(x,y) := d1(x)+d2(x,y); otherwise, d(x,y) is not defined. (Thus, d(x,y) is defined if y is in N2(x) or, equivalently, if x is in N1(y).)
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个x和N2中的每个y，如果定义了d2（x，y），那么d（x，y）：=d1（x）+d2（x，y）；否则，不定义d（x，y）。（因此，如果y在N2（x）中或等效地，如果x在N1（y）中，则定义d（x，y）。）

contents.text: o For any subset S of N1 and for each y in N2, the metric d(y,S) is the minimum value of d1(y), if defined, and of all d(x,y) for x in N1(y) and in S. If there are no such metrics to take the minimum value of, then d(y,S) is undefined (may be considered to be infinite). From the final property above, d(y,N1) is defined for all y.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1的任何子集S和N2中的每个y，度量d（y，S）是d1（y）的最小值（如果定义），并且是N1（y）和S中x的所有d（x，y）的最小值。如果没有此类度量取最小值，则d（y，S）未定义（可以认为是无限的）。根据上面的最后一个属性，为所有y定义了d（y，N1）。

contents.text: 18.3. MPR Properties
contents.zh-CHS: 18.3. MPR特性

contents.text: Given a Neighbor Graph as defined in Section 18.2, an MPR Set for that Neighbor Graph is a subset M of the set N1 that satisfies the following properties:
contents.zh-CHS: 给定第18.2节中定义的相邻图，该相邻图的MPR集是满足以下属性的集合N1的子集M：

contents.text: o If x in N1 has W(x) = WILL_ALWAYS, then x is in M.
contents.zh-CHS: o 如果N1中的x有W（x）=WILL_，那么x在M中。

contents.text: o For any y in N2 that does not have a defined d1(y), there is at least one element in M that is also in N1(y). This is equivalent to the requirement that d(y,M) is defined.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N2中未定义d1（y）的任何y，M中至少有一个元素也位于N1（y）中。这相当于定义d（y，M）的要求。

contents.text: o For any y in N2, d(y,M) = d(y,N1).
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N2中的任何y，d（y，M）=d（y，N1）。

contents.text: These properties reflect that the MPR Set consists of a set of symmetric 1-hop neighbors that cover all the symmetric 2-hop neighbors and that they do so retaining a minimum distance route (1-hop, if present, or 2-hop) to each symmetric 2-hop neighbor.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些属性反映了MPR集由一组对称的1-hop邻居组成，这些邻居覆盖所有对称的2-hop邻居，并且它们保留到每个对称的2-hop邻居的最小距离路由（1-hop，如果存在，或2-hop）。

contents.text: Note that if M is an MPR Set, then so is any subset of N1 that contains M; also note that N1 is always an MPR Set. An MPR Set may be empty but cannot be empty if N2 contains any elements y that do not have a defined d1(y).
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，如果M是MPR集，那么包含M的N1的任何子集也是MPR集；还要注意，N1始终是MPR集。如果N2包含任何未定义d1（y）的元素y，则MPR集合可以为空，但不能为空。

contents.text: 18.4. Flooding MPRs
contents.zh-CHS: 18.4. 泛洪MPR

contents.text: Whenever flooding MPRs are to be calculated, an implementation MUST determine and record a set of flooding MPRs that is equivalent to one calculated as described in this section.
contents.zh-CHS: 每当要计算泛洪MPR时，实施必须确定并记录一组泛洪MPR，该组泛洪MPR相当于按照本节所述计算的一组泛洪MPR。

contents.text: The calculation of flooding MPRs need not use link metrics or, equivalently, may use link metrics with a fixed value, here taken to be 1. However, links with unknown metric (L_out_metric = UNKNOWN_METRIC) MUST NOT be used even if link metrics are otherwise not used.
contents.zh-CHS: 泛洪MPR的计算不需要使用链路度量，或者等效地，可以使用具有固定值的链路度量，这里取为1。但是，即使未使用链路度量，也不得使用具有未知度量（L_out_metric=未知_metric）的链路。

contents.text: Routers MAY make individual decisions as to whether to use link metrics for the calculation of flooding MPRs. A router MUST use the same approach to the choice of whether to use link metrics for all links, i.e., in the cases indicated by A or B, the same choice MUST be made in each case.
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器可以单独决定是否使用链路度量来计算泛洪MPR。路由器必须使用相同的方法来选择是否对所有链路使用链路度量，即，在A或B指示的情况下，必须在每种情况下做出相同的选择。

contents.text: For each OLSRv2 interface (the "current interface"), define a Neighbor Graph as defined in Section 18.2 according to the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 对于每个OLSRv2接口（“当前接口”），根据以下内容定义第18.2节中定义的相邻图：

contents.text: o Define a reachable Link Tuple to be a Link Tuple in the Link Set for the current interface with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将可访问链接元组定义为当前接口的链接集中的链接元组，L_status=SYMMETRIC，L_out_metric！=未知度量。

contents.text: o Define an allowed Link Tuple to be a reachable Link Tuple whose corresponding Neighbor Tuple has N_will_flooding > WILL_NEVER.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将允许的链接元组定义为其对应的邻居元组具有N_will_flooding>will_NEVER的可到达链接元组。

contents.text: o Define an allowed 2-Hop Tuple to be a 2-Hop Tuple in the 2-Hop Set for the current interface for which N2_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC and there is an allowed Link Tuple with L_neighbor_iface_addr_list = N2_neighbor_iface_addr_list.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将允许的2-Hop元组定义为当前接口的2-Hop集中的2-Hop元组，该接口的N2_out_metric！=未知度量，并且存在一个允许的链接元组，该元组的L\u neighbor\u iface\u addr\u list=N2\u neighbor\u iface\u addr\u list。

contents.text: o Define an element of N1 for each allowed Link Tuple. This then defines the corresponding Link Tuple for each element of N1 and the corresponding Neighbor Tuple for each element of N1, being the Neighbor Tuple corresponding to that Link Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: o 为每个允许的链接元组定义一个N1元素。然后，为N1的每个元素定义对应的链接元组，并为N1的每个元素定义对应的邻居元组，即对应于该链接元组的邻居元组。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, define W(x) := N_will_flooding of the corresponding Neighbor Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，定义W（x）：=N\u将\u对应相邻元组的泛洪。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, define d1(x) as either:
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，将d1（x）定义为：

contents.text: A. L_out_metric of the corresponding Link Tuple; OR
contents.zh-CHS: A.对应链接元组的L_out_度量；或

contents.text: o Define an element of N2 for each network address that is the N2_2hop_addr of one or more allowed 2-Hop Tuples. This then defines the corresponding address for each element of N2.
contents.zh-CHS: o 为每个网络地址定义一个N2元素，该地址是一个或多个允许的2跳元组的N2跳地址。然后为N2的每个元素定义相应的地址。

contents.text: o For each element y in N2, if the corresponding address is in the N_neighbor_addr_list of a Neighbor Tuple that corresponds to one or more reachable Link Tuples, then define d1(y) as either:
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N2中的每个元素y，如果对应的地址在对应于一个或多个可到达链路元组的邻居元组的N_neighbor_addr_列表中，则将d1（y）定义为：

contents.text: A. the minimum value of the L_out_metric of those Link Tuples; OR
contents.zh-CHS: A.这些链接元组的L_out_度量的最小值；或

contents.text: Otherwise, d1(y) is not defined. In the latter case, where d1(y) := 1, all such y in N2 may instead be removed from N2.
contents.zh-CHS: 否则，不定义d1（y）。在后一种情况下，其中d1（y）：=1，可以从N2中移除N2中的所有这样的y。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, define N2(x) as the set of elements y in N2 whose corresponding address is the N2_2hop_addr of an allowed 2-Hop Tuple that has N2_neighbor_iface_addr_list = L_neighbor_iface_addr_list of the Link Tuple corresponding to x. For all such x and y, define d2(x,y) as either:
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，将N2（x）定义为N2中的元素y的集合，其对应地址是允许的2跳元组的N2_2hop_addr，该元组具有与x对应的链接元组的N2_neighbor_iface_addr_list=L_neighbor_iface_addr_list。对于所有这些x和y，将d2（x，y）定义为：

contents.text: A. N2_out_metric of that 2-Hop Tuple; OR
contents.zh-CHS: A.该2跳元组的N2_out_度量；或

contents.text: It is up to an implementation to decide how to label each element of N1 or N2. For example, an element of N1 may be labeled with one or more addresses from the corresponding L_neighbor_iface_addr_list or with a pointer or reference to the corresponding Link Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: 由实现决定如何标记N1或N2的每个元素。例如，N1的元素可以用来自相应的L_neighbor_iface_addr_列表的一个或多个地址或者用指向相应链接元组的指针或引用来标记。

contents.text: Using these Neighbor Graphs, flooding MPRs are selected and recorded by:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用这些相邻图，通过以下方式选择和记录泛洪MPR：

contents.text: o For each OLSRv2 interface, determine an MPR Set as specified in Section 18.3.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于每个OLSRv2接口，确定第18.3节中规定的MPR集。

contents.text: o A Neighbor Tuple represents a flooding MPR and has N_flooding_mpr := true (otherwise, N_flooding_mpr := false) if and only if that Neighbor Tuple corresponds to an element in an MPR Set created for any interface as described above. That is, the overall set of flooding MPRs is the union of the sets of flooding MPRs for all OLSRv2 interfaces.
contents.zh-CHS: o 邻居元组表示泛洪MPR，并且当且仅当该邻居元组对应于为上述任何接口创建的MPR集中的元素时，其N_flooding_MPR:=true（否则，N_flooding_MPR:=false）。也就是说，整个泛洪MPR集是所有OLSRv2接口的泛洪MPR集的联合。

contents.text: A router MAY select its flooding MPRs for each OLSRv2 interface independently, or it MAY coordinate its MPR selections across its OLSRv2 interfaces, as long as the required condition is satisfied for each OLSRv2 interface. One such coordinated approach is to process the OLSRv2 interfaces sequentially and, for each OLSRv2 interface, start with flooding MPRs selected (and not removable) if the neighbor has been already selected as an MPR for an OLSRv2 interface that has already been processed. The algorithm specified in Appendix B can be used in this way.
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器可以独立地为每个OLSRv2接口选择其泛洪MPR，也可以跨其OLSRv2接口协调其MPR选择，只要每个OLSRv2接口满足所需条件。一种这样的协调方法是顺序处理OLSRv2接口，并且对于每个OLSRv2接口，如果邻居已经被选择为已经处理的OLSRv2接口的MPR，则从选择的泛洪MPR（且不可移动）开始。附录B中规定的算法可以这样使用。

contents.text: 18.5. Routing MPRs
contents.zh-CHS: 18.5. 路由MPR

contents.text: Whenever routing MPRs are to be calculated, an implementation MUST determine and record a set of routing MPRs that is equivalent to one calculated as described in this section.
contents.zh-CHS: 每当要计算路由MPR时，实现必须确定并记录一组路由MPR，该路由MPR相当于本节中所述的一组路由MPR。

contents.text: Define a single Neighbor Graph as defined in Section 18.2 according to the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 根据以下内容定义第18.2节中定义的单个相邻图：

contents.text: o Define a reachable Neighbor Tuple to be a Neighbor Tuple with N_symmetric = true and N_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将可到达的邻居元组定义为N_symmetric=true且N_in_metric！=未知度量。

contents.text: o Define an allowed Neighbor Tuple to be a reachable Neighbor Tuple with N_will_routing > WILL_NEVER.
contents.zh-CHS: o 将允许的邻居元组定义为N_will_routing>will_NEVER的可访问邻居元组。

contents.text: o Define an allowed 2-Hop Tuple to be a 2-Hop Tuple in the 2-Hop Set for any OLSRv2 interface with N2_in_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC and for which there is an allowed Neighbor Tuple with N_neighbor_addr_list containing N2_neighbor_iface_addr_list.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于任何具有N2_in_度量的OLSRv2接口，将允许的2-Hop元组定义为2-Hop集中的2-Hop元组！=未知的\度量，其允许的邻居元组具有包含N2\邻居\地址\列表的N\邻居\地址\列表。

contents.text: o Define an element of N1 for each allowed Neighbor Tuple. This then defines the corresponding Neighbor Tuple for each element of N1.
contents.zh-CHS: o 为每个允许的邻居元组定义一个N1元素。然后为N1的每个元素定义相应的邻居元组。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, define W(x) := N_will_routing of the corresponding Neighbor Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，定义W（x）：=N\u将\u路由对应的相邻元组。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, define d1(x) := N_in_metric of the corresponding Neighbor Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，定义d1（x）：=N_in_度量对应的相邻元组。

contents.text: o Define an element of N2 for each network address that is the N2_2hop_addr of one or more allowed 2-Hop Tuples. This then defines the corresponding address for each element of N2.
contents.zh-CHS: o 为每个网络地址定义一个N2元素，该地址是一个或多个允许的2跳元组的N2跳地址。然后为N2的每个元素定义相应的地址。

contents.text: o For each element y in N2, if the corresponding address is in the N_neighbor_addr_list of a reachable Neighbor Tuple, then define d1(y) to be the N_in_metric of that Neighbor Tuple; otherwise, d1(y) is not defined.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N2中的每个元素y，如果对应的地址在可到达邻居元组的N_neighbor_addr_列表中，则将d1（y）定义为该邻居元组的N_in_度量；否则，不定义d1（y）。

contents.text: o For each element x in N1, define N2(x) as the set of elements y in N2 whose corresponding address is the N2_2hop_addr of an allowed 2-Hop Tuple that has N2_neighbor_iface_addr_list contained in N_neighbor_addr_list of the Neighbor Tuple corresponding to x. For all such x and y, define d2(x,y) := N2_out_metric of that 2-Hop Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: o 对于N1中的每个元素x，将N2（x）定义为N2中的元素y的集合，其对应地址是允许的2跳元组的N2_2hop_addr，该2跳元组的N2_neighbor_iface_addr_列表包含在对应于x的相邻元组的N_neighbor_addr_列表中。对于所有这样的x和y，定义d2（x，y）：=N2\u out\u该2跳元组的度量。

contents.text: It is up to an implementation to decide how to label each element of N1 or N2. For example, an element of N1 may be labeled with one or more addresses from the corresponding N_neighbor_addr_list or with a pointer or reference to the corresponding Neighbor Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: 由实现决定如何标记N1或N2的每个元素。例如，N1的元素可以用来自相应的N_neighbor_addr_列表的一个或多个地址或者用指向相应的邻居元组的指针或引用来标记。

contents.text: Using these Neighbor Graphs, routing MPRs are selected and recorded according to the following:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用这些相邻图，根据以下内容选择并记录路由MPR：

contents.text: o Determine an MPR Set as specified in Section 18.3.
contents.zh-CHS: o 确定第18.3节规定的MPR集。

contents.text: o A Neighbor Tuple represents a routing MPR and has N_routing_mpr := true (otherwise, N_routing_mpr := false) if and only if that Neighbor Tuple corresponds to an element in the MPR Set created as described above.
contents.zh-CHS: o 当且仅当邻居元组对应于如上所述创建的MPR集中的元素时，邻居元组表示路由MPR，且具有N_routing_MPR:=true（否则，N_routing_MPR:=false）。

contents.text: 18.6. Calculating MPRs
contents.zh-CHS: 18.6. 计算MPR

contents.text: A router MUST recalculate each of its sets of MPRs whenever the currently selected set of MPRs does not still satisfy the required conditions. It MAY recalculate its MPRs if the current set of MPRs is still valid but could be more efficient. Sufficient conditions to recalculate a router's sets of MPRs are given in Section 17.6.
contents.zh-CHS: 当当前选择的MPR集仍不满足要求的条件时，路由器必须重新计算其MPR集。如果当前MPR集仍然有效，但效率可能更高，则可以重新计算其MPR。第17.6节给出了重新计算路由器MPR集的充分条件。

contents.text: 19. Routing Set Calculation
contents.zh-CHS: 19. 路由集计算

contents.text: The Routing Set of a router is populated with Routing Tuples that represent paths from that router to all destinations in the network. These paths are calculated based on the Network Topology Graph, which is constructed from information in the Information Bases, obtained via HELLO and TC message exchange.
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器的路由集由表示从该路由器到网络中所有目的地的路径的路由元组填充。这些路径是基于网络拓扑图计算的，网络拓扑图是根据通过HELLO和TC消息交换获得的信息库中的信息构建的。

contents.text: Changes to the Routing Set do not require any messages to be transmitted. The state of the Routing Set SHOULD, however, be reflected in the IP routing table by adding and removing entries from that routing table as appropriate. Only appropriate Routing Tuples (in particular only those that represent local links or paths to routable addresses) need be reflected in the IP routing table.
contents.zh-CHS: 对路由集的更改不需要传输任何消息。但是，路由集的状态应该通过适当地从该路由表中添加和删除条目来反映在IP路由表中。IP路由表中只需要反映适当的路由元组（尤其是那些表示本地链接或可路由地址路径的元组）。

contents.text: 19.1. Network Topology Graph
contents.zh-CHS: 19.1. 网络拓扑图

contents.text: The Network Topology Graph is formed from information from the router's Local Interface Set, Link Sets for OLSRv2 interfaces, Neighbor Set, Router Topology Set, Routable Address Topology Set, and Attached Network Set. The Network Topology Graph MAY also use information from the router's 2-Hop Sets for OLSRv2 interfaces. The Network Topology Graph forms the router's topological view of the network in the form of a directed graph. Each edge in that graph has a metric value. The Network Topology Graph has a "backbone" (within which minimum total metric routes will be constructed) containing the following edges:
contents.zh-CHS: 网络拓扑图由来自路由器的本地接口集、OLSRv2接口的链路集、邻居集、路由器拓扑集、可路由地址拓扑集和连接的网络集的信息构成。网络拓扑图还可以使用来自路由器的OLSRv2接口的2跳集的信息。网络拓扑图以有向图的形式形成路由器的网络拓扑视图。该图中的每条边都有一个度量值。网络拓扑图有一个“主干”（其中将构建最小总度量路由），包含以下边：

contents.text: o Edges X -> Y for all possible Y, and one X per Y, such that:
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有可能Y的边X->Y，每个Y一个X，这样：

contents.text: * Y is the N_orig_addr of a Neighbor Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * Y是相邻元组的N_orig_addr；和

contents.text: * N_orig_addr is not unknown; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * N_orig_addr并非未知；和

contents.text: * X is in the I_local_iface_addr_list of a Local Interface Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * X在本地接口元组的I_local_iface_addr_列表中；和

contents.text: * There is a Link Tuple with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC such that this Neighbor Tuple and this Local Interface Tuple correspond to it. A network address from L_neighbor_iface_addr_list will be denoted R in this case.
contents.zh-CHS: * 有一个链接元组的L_status=对称，L_out_metric！=未知的_度量，使得此邻居元组和此本地接口元组对应于它。在这种情况下，来自L_neighbor_iface_addr_列表的网络地址将表示为R。

contents.text: It SHOULD be preferred, where possible, to select R = Y and to select X from the Local Interface Tuple corresponding to the Link Tuple from which R was selected. The metric for such an edge is the corresponding N_out_metric.
contents.zh-CHS: 在可能的情况下，最好选择R=Y，并从与从中选择R的链接元组对应的本地接口元组中选择X。此边的度量是相应的N_out_度量。

contents.text: o All edges W -> U such that:
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有边W->U，以便：

contents.text: * W is the TR_from_orig_addr of a Router Topology Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * W是路由器拓扑元组的TR_from_orig_addr；和

contents.text: * U is the TR_to_orig_addr of the same Router Topology Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: * U是同一路由器拓扑元组的TR_to_orig_addr。

contents.text: The metric of such an edge is the corresponding TR_metric.
contents.zh-CHS: 这样一条边的度量是对应的tru度量。

contents.text: The Network Topology Graph is further "decorated" with the following edges. If a network address S, V, Z, or T equals a network address Y or W, then the edge terminating in the network address S, V, Z, or T MUST NOT be used in any path.
contents.zh-CHS: 网络拓扑图进一步用以下边“修饰”。如果网络地址S、V、Z或T等于网络地址Y或W，则终止于网络地址S、V、Z或T的边缘不得用于任何路径。

contents.text: o Edges X -> S for all possible S, and one X per S, such that:
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有可能的S的边X->S，每个S一个X，这样：

contents.text: * S is in the N_neighbor_addr_list of a Neighbor Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * S在邻居元组的N_neighbor_addr_列表中；和

contents.text: * X is in the I_local_iface_addr_list of a Local Interface Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * X在本地接口元组的I_local_iface_addr_列表中；和

contents.text: * There is a Link Tuple with L_status = SYMMETRIC and L_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC such that this Neighbor Tuple and this Local Interface Tuple correspond to it. A network address from L_neighbor_iface_addr_list will be denoted R in this case.
contents.zh-CHS: * 有一个链接元组的L_status=对称，L_out_metric！=未知的_度量，使得此邻居元组和此本地接口元组对应于它。在这种情况下，来自L_neighbor_iface_addr_列表的网络地址将表示为R。

contents.text: It SHOULD be preferred, where possible, to select R = S and to select X from the Local Interface Tuple corresponding to the Link Tuple from which R was selected. The metric for such an edge is the corresponding N_out_metric.
contents.zh-CHS: 在可能的情况下，最好选择R=S，并从与从中选择R的链接元组对应的本地接口元组中选择X。此边的度量是相应的N_out_度量。

contents.text: o All edges W -> V such that:
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有边W->V，以便：

contents.text: * W is the TA_from_orig_addr of a Routable Address Topology Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * W是可路由地址拓扑元组的TA_from_orig_addr；和

contents.text: * V is the TA_dest_addr of the same Routable Address Topology Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: * V是相同可路由地址拓扑元组的TA_dest_addr。

contents.text: The metric for such an edge is the corresponding TA_metric.
contents.zh-CHS: 此类边的度量是相应的TA_度量。

contents.text: o All edges W -> T such that:
contents.zh-CHS: o 所有边W->T，以便：

contents.text: * W is the AN_orig_addr of an Attached Network Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * W是附加网络元组的原始地址；和

contents.text: * T is the AN_net_addr of the same Attached Network Tuple.
contents.zh-CHS: * T是同一连接网络元组的AN_net_addr。

contents.text: The metric for such an edge is the corresponding AN_metric.
contents.zh-CHS: 这种边的度量是对应的an_度量。

contents.text: o (OPTIONAL) All edges Y -> Z such that:
contents.zh-CHS: o （可选）所有边Y->Z，以便：

contents.text: * Z is a routable address and is the N2_2hop_addr of a 2-Hop Tuple with N2_out_metric != UNKNOWN_METRIC; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * Z是一个可路由地址，是一个2跳元组的N2跳地址，具有N2跳出度量！=未知度量；和

contents.text: * Y is the N_orig_addr of the corresponding Neighbor Tuple; AND
contents.zh-CHS: * Y是对应的相邻元组的N_orig_addr；和

contents.text: * This Neighbor Tuple has N_will_routing not equal to WILL_NEVER.
contents.zh-CHS: * 此邻居元组的N_will_路由不等于will_NEVER。

contents.text: A path terminating with such an edge MUST NOT be used in preference to any other path. The metric for such an edge is the corresponding N2_out_metric.
contents.zh-CHS: 以这样一条边终止的路径不得优先于任何其他路径使用。此边的度量是相应的N2_out_度量。

contents.text: Any part of the Topology Graph that is not connected to a local network address X is not used. Only one selection X SHOULD be made from each I_local_iface_addr_list, and only one selection R SHOULD be made from any L_neighbor_iface_addr_list. All edges have a hop count of 1, except edges W -> T that have a hop count of the corresponding value of AN_dist.
contents.zh-CHS: 不使用未连接到本地网络地址X的拓扑图的任何部分。每个I_local_iface_addr_列表只能选择一个X，任何L_neighbor_iface_addr_列表只能选择一个R。所有边的跃点计数均为1，但边W->T的跃点计数为对应的距离值。

contents.text: 19.2. Populating the Routing Set
contents.zh-CHS: 19.2. 填充路由集

contents.text: The Routing Set MUST contain the shortest paths for all destinations from all local OLSRv2 interfaces using the Network Topology Graph. This calculation MAY use any algorithm, including any means of choosing between paths of equal total metric. (In the case of two paths of equal total metric but differing hop counts, the path with the lower hop count SHOULD be used.)
contents.zh-CHS: 路由集必须包含使用网络拓扑图的所有本地OLSRv2接口的所有目的地的最短路径。该计算可以使用任何算法，包括在总度量相等的路径之间进行选择的任何方法。（如果两条路径的总度量相等，但跳数不同，则应使用跳数较低的路径。）

contents.text: Using the notation of Section 19.1, initially "backbone" paths using only edges X -> Y and W -> U need be constructed (using a minimum distance algorithm). Then paths using only a final edge of the other types may be added. These MUST NOT replace backbone paths with the same destination (and paths terminating in an edge Y -> Z SHOULD NOT replace paths with any other form of terminating edge).
contents.zh-CHS: 使用第19.1节的符号，最初只需要使用边X->Y和W->U构建“主干”路径（使用最小距离算法）。然后，可以添加仅使用其他类型的最终边的路径。这些路径不能用相同的目标替换主干路径（并且以Y->Z边终止的路径不应该用任何其他形式的终止边替换路径）。

contents.text: Each path will correspond to a Routing Tuple. These will be of two types. The first type will represent single edge paths, of type X -> S or X -> Y, by:
contents.zh-CHS: 每个路径将对应一个路由元组。这将有两种类型。第一种类型通过以下方式表示X->S或X->Y类型的单边路径：

contents.text: o R_local_iface_addr := X;
contents.zh-CHS: o R_local_iface_addr:=X；

contents.text: o R_next_iface_addr := R;
contents.zh-CHS: o R\u next\u iface\u addr:=R；

contents.text: o R_dest_addr := S or Y;
contents.zh-CHS: o R_dest_addr:=S或Y；

contents.text: o R_dist := 1;
contents.zh-CHS: o R_dist:=1；

contents.text: o R_metric := edge metric,
contents.zh-CHS: o R_度量：=边度量，

contents.text: where R is as defined in Section 19.1 for these types of edge.
contents.zh-CHS: 其中R如第19.1节中对这些类型边缘的定义。

contents.text: The second type will represent a multiple edge path, which will always have first edge of type X -> Y, and will have final edge of type W -> U, W -> V, W -> T, or Y -> Z. The Routing Tuple will be:
contents.zh-CHS: 第二种类型将表示多条边路径，其第一条边的类型始终为X->Y，最后一条边的类型为W->U、W->V、W->T或Y->Z。路由元组将为：

contents.text: o R_local_iface_addr := X;
contents.zh-CHS: o R_local_iface_addr:=X；

contents.text: o R_next_iface_addr := Y;
contents.zh-CHS: o 下一个地址：=Y；

contents.text: o R_dest_addr := U, V, T or Z;
contents.zh-CHS: o R_dest_addr:=U、V、T或Z；

contents.text: o R_dist := the total hop count of all edges in the path;
contents.zh-CHS: o R_dist:=路径中所有边的总跳数；

contents.text: o R_metric := the total metric of all edges in the path.
contents.zh-CHS: o R_metric:=路径中所有边的总度量。

contents.text: Finally, Routing Tuples of the second type whose R_dest_addr is not routable MAY be discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后，第二种类型的路由元组（其R_dest_addr不可路由）可能会被丢弃。

contents.text: An example algorithm for calculating the Routing Set of a router is given in Appendix C.
contents.zh-CHS: 附录C给出了计算路由器路由集的示例算法。

contents.text: 20. Proposed Values for Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 20. 参数的建议值

contents.text: This protocol uses all parameters defined in [RFC6130] and additional parameters defined in this specification. All but one (RX_HOLD_TIME) of these additional parameters are router parameters as defined in [RFC6130]. The proposed values of the additional parameters defined in the following sections are appropriate to the case where all parameters (including those defined in [RFC6130]) have a single value. Proposed values for parameters defined in [RFC6130] are given in that specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 本协议使用[RFC6130]中定义的所有参数以及本规范中定义的其他参数。除一个（RX_保持时间）外，所有这些附加参数都是[RFC6130]中定义的路由器参数。以下章节中定义的附加参数的建议值适用于所有参数（包括[RFC6130]中定义的参数）具有单一值的情况。[RFC6130]中定义的参数的建议值在该规范中给出。

contents.text: The following proposed values are based on experience with [RFC3626] deployments (such as documented in [McCabe]) and are considered typical. They can be changed to accommodate different deployment requirements -- for example, a network with capacity-limited network interfaces would be expected to use greater values for message intervals, whereas a highly mobile network would be expected to use lower values for message intervals. When determining these values, the constraints specified in Section 5 MUST be respected.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下建议值基于[RFC3626]部署的经验（如[McCabe]中所述），被视为典型值。可以更改它们以适应不同的部署要求——例如，具有容量有限的网络接口的网络预期会使用更大的消息间隔值，而高度移动的网络预期会使用更低的消息间隔值。确定这些值时，必须遵守第5节中规定的约束条件。

contents.text: Note that routers in a MANET need not all use the same set of parameters, and those parameters that are indicated as interface parameters need not be the same on all OLSRv2 interfaces of a single router.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意，MANET中的路由器不需要全部使用相同的参数集，并且在单个路由器的所有OLSRv2接口上指示为接口参数的那些参数不需要相同。

contents.text: 20.1. Local History Time Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 20.1. 本地历史时间参数

contents.text: o O_HOLD_TIME := 30 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: o O_保持时间：=30秒

contents.text: 20.2. Message Interval Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 20.2. 消息间隔参数

contents.text: o TC_INTERVAL := 5 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: o TC_间隔：=5秒

contents.text: o TC_MIN_INTERVAL := TC_INTERVAL/4
contents.zh-CHS: o TC\U最小间隔：=TC\U间隔/4

contents.text: 20.3. Advertised Information Validity Time Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 20.3. 广告信息有效时间参数

contents.text: o T_HOLD_TIME := 3 x TC_INTERVAL
contents.zh-CHS: o T\u保持时间：=3 x TC\u间隔

contents.text: o A_HOLD_TIME := T_HOLD_TIME
contents.zh-CHS: o 保持时间：=保持时间

contents.text: 20.4. Received Message Validity Time Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 20.4. 接收消息有效时间参数

contents.text: o RX_HOLD_TIME := 30 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: o 接收保持时间：=30秒

contents.text: o P_HOLD_TIME := 30 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: o 保压时间：=30秒

contents.text: o F_HOLD_TIME := 30 seconds
contents.zh-CHS: o F_保持时间：=30秒

contents.text: 20.5. Jitter Time Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 20.5. 抖动时间参数

contents.text: o TP_MAXJITTER := HP_MAXJITTER
contents.zh-CHS: o TP_MAXJITTER:=HP_MAXJITTER

contents.text: o TT_MAXJITTER := HT_MAXJITTER
contents.zh-CHS: o TT_MAXJITTER:=HT_MAXJITTER

contents.text: o F_MAXJITTER := TT_MAXJITTER
contents.zh-CHS: o F_MAXJITTER:=TT_MAXJITTER

contents.text: 20.6. Hop Limit Parameter
contents.zh-CHS: 20.6. 跳数限制参数

contents.text: o TC_HOP_LIMIT := 255
contents.zh-CHS: o TC_跃点限制：=255

contents.text: 20.7. Willingness Parameters
contents.zh-CHS: 20.7. 意愿参数

contents.text: o WILL_FLOODING := WILL_DEFAULT
contents.zh-CHS: o WILL\u泛洪：=WILL\u默认值

contents.text: o WILL_ROUTING := WILL_DEFAULT
contents.zh-CHS: o WILL\u路由：=WILL\u默认值

contents.text: 21. Sequence Numbers
contents.zh-CHS: 21. 序列号

contents.text: Sequence numbers are used in this specification for the purpose of discarding "old" information, i.e., messages received out of order. However, with a limited number of bits for representing sequence numbers, wraparound (in which the sequence number is incremented from the maximum possible value to zero) will occur. To prevent this from interfering with the operation of this protocol, the following MUST be observed when determining the ordering of sequence numbers.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本规范中，序列号用于丢弃“旧”信息，即无序接收的消息。然而，对于表示序列号的有限位数，将发生换行（其中序列号从最大可能值增加到零）。为防止干扰本协议的操作，在确定序列号顺序时必须遵守以下规定。

contents.text: The term MAXVALUE designates in the following one more than the largest possible value for a sequence number. For a 16-bit sequence number (like those defined in this specification), MAXVALUE is 65536.
contents.zh-CHS: 术语MAXVALUE在下面一个中指定的值大于序列号的最大可能值。对于16位序列号（如本规范中定义的序列号），MAXVALUE为65536。

contents.text: The sequence number S1 is said to be "greater than" the sequence number S2 if:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果：

contents.text: o S1 > S2 AND S1 - S2 < MAXVALUE/2, OR
contents.zh-CHS: o S1>S2和S1-S2<MAXVALUE/2，或

contents.text: o S2 > S1 AND S2 - S1 > MAXVALUE/2
contents.zh-CHS: o S2>S1和S2-S1>MAXVALUE/2

contents.text: When sequence numbers S1 and S2 differ by MAXVALUE/2, their ordering cannot be determined. In this case, which should not occur, either ordering may be assumed.
contents.zh-CHS: 当序列号S1和S2相差MAXVALUE/2时，无法确定其顺序。在这种情况下，不应出现这种情况，可以假定这两种顺序。

contents.text: Thus, when comparing two messages, it is possible -- even in the presence of wraparound -- to determine which message contains the most recent information.
contents.zh-CHS: 因此，在比较两条消息时，甚至在存在wrapparound的情况下，也可以确定哪个消息包含最新的信息。

contents.text: 22. Extensions
contents.zh-CHS: 22. 扩展

contents.text: An extension to this protocol will need to interact with this specification and possibly also with [RFC6130]. This protocol is designed to permit such interactions, in particular:
contents.zh-CHS: 本协议的扩展需要与本规范交互，也可能与[RFC6130]交互。本协议旨在允许此类交互，特别是：

contents.text: o Through accessing, and possibly extending, the information in the Information Bases. All updates to the elements specified in this specification are subject to the normative constraints specified in [RFC6130] and Appendix A. Note that the processing specified in this document ensures that these constraints are satisfied.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过访问并可能扩展信息库中的信息。本规范中规定的所有元素更新均受[RFC6130]和附录A中规定的规范约束。注意，本文件中规定的处理确保满足这些约束。

contents.text: o Through accessing an outgoing message prior to it being transmitted over any OLSRv2 interface and adding information to it as specified in [RFC5444]. This MAY include Message TLVs and/or network addresses with associated Address Block TLVs. (Network addresses without new associated TLVs SHOULD NOT be added to
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过在通过任何OLSRv2接口传输前访问传出消息，并按照[RFC5444]中的规定向其添加信息。这可能包括消息tlv和/或具有相关地址块tlv的网络地址。（不应将没有新关联TLV的网络地址添加到

contents.text: messages.) This may, for example, be to allow a security protocol, as suggested in Section 23, to add a TLV containing a cryptographic signature to the message.
contents.zh-CHS: 例如，这可能是允许安全协议（如第23节所建议）向消息添加包含加密签名的TLV。

contents.text: o Through accessing an incoming message and potentially discarding it prior to processing by this protocol. This may, for example, allow a security protocol, as suggested in Section 23, to perform verification of message signatures and prevent processing and/or forwarding of unverifiable messages by this protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过访问传入消息并在使用此协议进行处理之前可能将其丢弃。例如，这可以允许第23节中建议的安全协议执行消息签名的验证，并防止通过该协议处理和/或转发无法验证的消息。

contents.text: o Through accessing an incoming message after it has been completely processed by this protocol. In particular, this may allow a protocol that has added information, by way of inclusion of appropriate TLVs or of network addresses associated with new TLVs, access to such information after appropriate updates have been recorded in the Information Bases in this protocol.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过在此协议完全处理后访问传入消息。特别地，这可以允许通过包括适当的tlv或与新tlv相关联的网络地址而添加了信息的协议在该协议的信息库中记录了适当的更新之后访问此类信息。

contents.text: o Through requesting that a message be generated at a specific time. In that case, message generation MUST still respect the constraints in [RFC6130] and Section 5.4.3.
contents.zh-CHS: o 通过请求在特定时间生成消息。在这种情况下，消息生成仍必须遵守[RFC6130]和第5.4.3节中的约束。

contents.text: 23. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 23. 安全考虑

contents.text: As a proactive routing protocol, OLSRv2 is a potential target for various attacks. This section presents the envisioned security architecture for OLSRv2 and gives guidelines on how to provide integrity, confidentiality, and integration into external routing domains. Separately specified mandatory security mechanisms are summarized, and some observations on key management are given.
contents.zh-CHS: 作为一种主动路由协议，OLSRv2是各种攻击的潜在目标。本节介绍了OLSRv2设想的安全体系结构，并给出了如何提供完整性、机密性和集成到外部路由域的指导原则。总结了单独指定的强制安全机制，并给出了一些关于密钥管理的意见。

contents.text: 23.1. Security Architecture
contents.zh-CHS: 23.1. 安全体系结构

contents.text: OLSRv2 integrates into the architecture specified in Appendix A of [RFC5444], in [RFC5498], and in Section 16 of [RFC6130], the latter by using and extending its messages and Information Bases.
contents.zh-CHS: OLSRv2通过使用和扩展其消息和信息库，集成到[RFC5444]附录A、[RFC5498]和[RFC6130]第16节中规定的体系结构中。

contents.text: As part of this architecture, OLSRv2 and NHDP [RFC6130] recognize that there may be external reasons for rejecting messages that would be considered "badly formed" or "insecure", e.g., if an Integrity Check Value (ICV) included in a message by an external mechanism cannot be verified. This architecture allows options as to whether and how to implement security features, reflecting the situation that MANET routing protocol deployment domains have varying security requirements, ranging from "practically unbreakable" to "virtually none". This approach allows MANET routing protocol specifications to remain generic, with extensions to them and/or extensions to the
contents.zh-CHS: 作为该体系结构的一部分，OLSRv2和NHDP[RFC6130]认识到拒绝被视为“格式错误”或“不安全”的消息可能有外部原因，例如，如果无法验证外部机制包含在消息中的完整性检查值（ICV）。该体系结构允许选择是否以及如何实现安全功能，反映了MANET路由协议部署域具有不同的安全需求的情况，从“几乎无法破解”到“几乎没有”。这种方法允许MANET路由协议规范保持通用性，并对其进行扩展和/或对

contents.text: multiplexing and demultiplexing process described in Appendix A of [RFC5444], providing security mechanisms appropriate to a given deployment domain.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC5444]附录A中描述的多路复用和解多路复用过程，提供适用于给定部署域的安全机制。

contents.text: The following sections provide guidelines on how to provide integrity, confidentiality, and integration with external routing domains in such extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节提供了有关如何在此类扩展中提供完整性、机密性以及与外部路由域集成的指南。

contents.text: 23.2. Integrity
contents.zh-CHS: 23.2. 诚实正直

contents.text: Each router injects topological information into the network by transmitting HELLO messages and, for some routers, also TC messages. If some routers for some reason (malice or malfunction) inject invalid control traffic, network integrity may be compromised. Therefore, message, or packet, authentication is strongly advised.
contents.zh-CHS: 每个路由器通过传输HELLO消息，以及对于某些路由器，还传输TC消息，将拓扑信息注入网络。如果某些路由器出于某种原因（恶意或故障）注入无效的控制流量，网络完整性可能会受到损害。因此，强烈建议使用消息或数据包身份验证。

contents.text: Different such situations may occur, for example:
contents.zh-CHS: 可能出现不同的此类情况，例如：

contents.text: 1. A router generates TC messages, advertising links to non-neighbor routers;
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 路由器生成TC消息，向非邻居路由器发送广告链接；

contents.text: 2. A router generates TC messages, pretending to be another router;
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 一个路由器生成TC消息，假装是另一个路由器；

contents.text: 3. A router generates HELLO messages, advertising non-neighbor routers;
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 路由器生成HELLO消息，向非邻居路由器发送广告；

contents.text: 4. A router generates HELLO messages, pretending to be another router;
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 路由器生成HELLO消息，假装是另一个路由器；

contents.text: 5. A router forwards altered control messages;
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 路由器转发改变的控制消息；

contents.text: 6. A router does not forward control messages;
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 路由器不转发控制消息；

contents.text: 7. A router does not select multipoint relays correctly;
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 路由器没有正确选择多点中继；

contents.text: 8. A router forwards broadcast control messages unaltered but does not forward unicast data traffic;
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 路由器转发未改变的广播控制消息，但不转发单播数据业务；

contents.text: 9. A router "replays" previously recorded control traffic from another router.
contents.zh-CHS: 9. 路由器“重放”先前从另一个路由器记录的控制流量。

contents.text: Authentication of the originator router for control messages (for situations 2, 4, and 5) and of the individual links announced in the control messages (for situations 1 and 3) may be used as a countermeasure. However, to prevent routers from repeating old (and correctly authenticated) information (situation 9), additional information is required (e.g., a timestamp or sequence number), allowing a router to positively identify such replayed messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 控制消息的发起者路由器的认证（对于情况2、4和5）和控制消息中宣布的单个链路的认证（对于情况1和3）可以用作对策。然而，为了防止路由器重复旧的（正确认证的）信息（情况9），需要额外的信息（例如，时间戳或序列号），从而允许路由器积极识别此类重播消息。

contents.text: In general, ICVs (e.g., digital signatures) and other required security information can be transmitted within the HELLO and TC messages or within a packet header using the TLV mechanism. Either option permits different levels of protection to coexist in the same network, if desired.
contents.zh-CHS: 通常，ICV（例如，数字签名）和其他所需的安全信息可以使用TLV机制在HELLO和TC消息内或在分组报头内传输。如果需要，任一选项都允许不同级别的保护在同一网络中共存。

contents.text: An important consideration is that all control messages (HELLO messages and TC messages) are transmitted to all routers in the 1-hop neighborhood and some control messages (TC messages) are flooded to all routers in the network. This is done in a packet that is transmitted to all routers in the 1-hop neighborhood, the current set of which may not be known. Thus, a control message or packet used by this protocol is always contained in a transmission destined for multiple destinations, and it is important that the authentication mechanism employed permits any receiving router to validate the authenticity of a message or packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个重要的考虑因素是，所有控制消息（HELLO消息和TC消息）被传输到1跳邻居中的所有路由器，并且一些控制消息（TC消息）被淹没到网络中的所有路由器。这是在一个数据包中完成的，该数据包被传输到1-hop邻居中的所有路由器，其中的当前组可能未知。因此，由该协议使用的控制消息或分组总是包含在目的地为多个目的地的传输中，并且所采用的认证机制允许任何接收路由器验证消息或分组的真实性是重要的。

contents.text: [RFC7182] specifies a common exchange format for cryptographic information in the form of Packet TLVs, Message TLVs, and Address Block TLVs, as specified in [RFC5444]. These may be used (and shared) among MANET routing protocol security extensions. In particular, [RFC7182] specifies the format of TLVs for containing Integrity Check Values (ICVs), i.e., signatures, for providing integrity, as well as TLVs for containing temporal information for preventing replay attacks. [RFC7182] specifies registries for using different ciphers and formats of temporal information. When using ICV TLVs in an OLSRv2 deployment, failure to verify an included ICV mandates rejection of an incoming message or packet as "invalid", according to Section 12.1 of [RFC6130] and according to Section 16.3.1 of this specification when using the multiplexing and demultiplexing process described in Appendix A of [RFC5444].
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC7182]按照[RFC5444]中的规定，以数据包TLV、消息TLV和地址块TLV的形式指定加密信息的通用交换格式。这些可在MANET路由协议安全扩展之间使用（和共享）。具体而言，[RFC7182]指定了用于包含完整性检查值（ICV）的TLV格式，即用于提供完整性的签名，以及用于包含时间信息以防止重播攻击的TLV。[RFC7182]指定使用不同密码和时间信息格式的注册表。当在OLSRv2部署中使用ICV TLV时，根据[RFC6130]第12.1节和本规范第16.3.1节，当使用[RFC5444]附录A中描述的多路复用和解多路复用过程时，如果未能验证包含的ICV，则要求拒绝传入消息或数据包为“无效”。

contents.text: [RFC7182] specifies how to insert ICVs into generated messages, how to verify incoming messages, and to reject "insecure" messages (i.e., messages without an ICV or with an ICV that cannot be verified). Different MANET deployments may, as a result of the purpose for which they are used and the possibility and nature of their configuration, require different ICV algorithms and timestamps or multiple keys, and thus, a security extension may use any of the different options provided in [RFC7182].
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC7182]指定如何在生成的消息中插入ICV，如何验证传入消息，以及拒绝“不安全”消息（即，没有ICV或ICV无法验证的消息）。不同的MANET部署可能由于其使用目的及其配置的可能性和性质而需要不同的ICV算法和时间戳或多个密钥，因此，安全扩展可能使用[RFC7182]中提供的任何不同选项。

contents.text: 23.3. Confidentiality

OLSRv2 periodically MPR floods topological information to all routers in the network. Hence, if used in an unprotected network, in particular, an unprotected wireless network, the network topology is revealed to anyone who successfully listens to the control messages. This information may serve an attacker to acquire details about the
contents.zh-CHS: OLSRv2定期MPR将拓扑信息洪泛到网络中的所有路由器。因此，如果在未受保护的网络中使用，特别是在未受保护的无线网络中，则网络拓扑将向成功侦听控制消息的任何人公开。此信息可能有助于攻击者获取有关

contents.text: topology and therefore to initiate more effective attacks against routers in the routing domain, e.g., by spoofing addresses of routers in the network and attracting traffic for these addresses. Note that this is independent of the data traffic and purely protects the control traffic, i.e., information about the network topology.
contents.zh-CHS: 拓扑，从而对路由域中的路由器发起更有效的攻击，例如，通过欺骗网络中路由器的地址并吸引这些地址的流量。注意，这独立于数据通信量，并且纯粹保护控制通信量，即关于网络拓扑的信息。

contents.text: In situations where the confidentiality of the network topology is of importance, regular cryptographic techniques, such as use of OLSRv2 multicast control packets encrypted using IPsec (e.g., with a shared secret key), can be applied to ensure that control traffic can be read and interpreted by only those authorized to do so. Alternatively, a security extension may specify a mechanism to provide confidentiality for control messages and/or packets. However, unless the information about the network topology itself is confidential, integrity of control messages (as specified in Section 23.2) is sufficient to admit only trusted routers (i.e., routers with valid credentials) to the network.
contents.zh-CHS: 在网络拓扑的机密性非常重要的情况下，可以应用常规加密技术，例如使用使用IPsec加密的OLSRv2多播控制分组（例如，使用共享密钥），以确保控制流量只能由授权的人读取和解释。或者，安全扩展可以指定为控制消息和/或分组提供机密性的机制。但是，除非有关网络拓扑结构本身的信息是保密的，否则控制消息的完整性（如第23.2节所规定）足以允许仅受信任的路由器（即具有有效凭据的路由器）进入网络。

contents.text: 23.4. Interaction with External Routing Domains
contents.zh-CHS: 23.4. 与外部路由域的交互

contents.text: This protocol provides a basic mechanism for injecting external routing information into this protocol's routing domain. Routing information can also be extracted from this protocol's Information Bases, in particular the Routing Set, and injected into an external routing domain, if the routing protocol governing that routing domain permits this.
contents.zh-CHS: 该协议提供了一种基本机制，用于将外部路由信息注入该协议的路由域。如果管理该路由域的路由协议允许，还可以从该协议的信息库（特别是路由集）提取路由信息，并将其注入外部路由域。

contents.text: When operating routers connecting a routing domain using this protocol to an external routing domain, care MUST be taken not to allow potentially insecure and untrustworthy information to be injected from this routing domain to an external routing domain. Care MUST also be taken to validate the correctness of information prior to it being injected, so as to avoid polluting routing tables with invalid information.
contents.zh-CHS: 当操作使用此协议将路由域连接到外部路由域的路由器时，必须小心不要允许潜在的不安全和不可信信息从此路由域注入到外部路由域。在注入信息之前，还必须注意验证信息的正确性，以避免使用无效信息污染路由表。

contents.text: A recommended way of extending connectivity from an external routing domain to this routing domain, which is routed using this protocol, is to assign an IP prefix (under the authority of the routers/ gateways connecting this routing domain with the external routing domain) exclusively to this routing domain and to configure the gateways to advertise routes for that IP prefix into the external routing domain.
contents.zh-CHS: 将连接从外部路由域扩展到此路由域（使用此协议路由）的推荐方法是分配IP前缀（在连接此路由域和外部路由域的路由器/网关的权限下）专用于此路由域，并将网关配置为将该IP前缀的路由播发到外部路由域。

contents.text: 23.5. Mandatory Security Mechanisms
contents.zh-CHS: 23.5. 强制性安全机制

contents.text: A conformant implementation of OLSRv2 MUST, at minimum, implement the security mechanisms specified in [RFC7183], providing integrity and replay protection of OLSRv2 control messages, including of HELLO
contents.zh-CHS: OLSRv2的一致性实现必须至少实现[RFC7183]中规定的安全机制，提供OLSRv2控制消息的完整性和重播保护，包括HELLO

contents.text: messages specified by [RFC6130] and used by OLSRv2, by inclusion of a timestamp TLV and an Integrity Check Value (ICV) TLV. This ICV TLV uses a SHA-256-based HMAC and one or more manually managed shared secret keys. The timestamp TLV is based on Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX) time, assuming router time synchronization.
contents.zh-CHS: [RFC6130]指定并由OLSRv2使用的消息，包括时间戳TLV和完整性检查值（ICV）TLV。此ICV TLV使用基于SHA-256的HMAC和一个或多个手动管理的共享密钥。时间戳TLV基于便携式操作系统接口（POSIX）时间，假设路由器时间同步。

contents.text: The baseline use case, for which this security mechanism provides adequate integrity protection without rekeying, is for short-lived (for example, up to a couple of months) OLSRv2 deployments.
contents.zh-CHS: 此安全机制在不重新设置密钥的情况下提供足够的完整性保护的基线用例适用于短期（例如，最多几个月）OLSRv2部署。

contents.text: Any deployment of OLSRv2 SHOULD use the security mechanism specified in [RFC7183] but MAY use another mechanism if more appropriate in an OLSRv2 deployment. For example, for longer-term OLSRv2 deployments, alternative security mechanisms (e.g., rekeying) SHOULD be considered.
contents.zh-CHS: OLSRv2的任何部署都应使用[RFC7183]中指定的安全机制，但如果在OLSRv2部署中更合适，可以使用另一种机制。例如，对于长期的OLSRv2部署，应考虑替代安全机制（例如，密钥更新）。

contents.text: 23.6. Key Management
contents.zh-CHS: 23.6. 密钥管理

contents.text: This specification, as well as [RFC7183], does not mandate automated key management (AKM) as part of the security architecture for OLSRv2. While some use cases for OLSRv2 may require AKM, the baseline assumption is that many use cases do not, for the reasons detailed below.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范以及[RFC7183]并未强制要求将自动密钥管理（AKM）作为OLSRv2安全体系结构的一部分。尽管OLSRv2的一些用例可能需要AKM，但基线假设是许多用例不需要AKM，原因如下所述。

contents.text: Bootstrapping a key is hard in a radio network, where it is, in general, not possible to determine from where a received signal was transmitted or if two transmissions come from the same or from different sources.
contents.zh-CHS: 在无线网络中，自举密钥是很困难的，一般来说，无法确定从何处发送接收到的信号，或者两次传输是来自同一来源还是来自不同来源。

contents.text: The widespread use of radio networks and mobile phone networks works under the assumptions that (i) secret information is embedded in mobile phones at manufacture, and (ii) a centralized database of this is accessible during the network lifetime.
contents.zh-CHS: 无线网络和移动电话网络的广泛使用是在以下假设下进行的：（i）机密信息在制造时嵌入移动电话中，以及（ii）在网络生命周期内可访问该信息的集中数据库。

contents.text: As a primary use case of a MANET is to provide connectivity without centralized entities and with minimal management, a solution such as described in the previous paragraph is not feasible. In many instances, a cryptographic authority may not be present in the MANET at all, since such a cryptographic authority would be too vulnerable. Due to the potentially dynamic topology of a MANET, a cryptographic authority may also become unreachable (to some or all of the MANET routers) without prior warning.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于移动自组网的一个主要用例是在没有集中实体的情况下提供连接，并且管理最少，因此如前一段所述的解决方案是不可行的。在许多情况下，MANET中可能根本不存在密码授权，因为这样的密码授权太容易受到攻击。由于MANET的潜在动态拓扑结构，在没有事先警告的情况下（对于部分或所有MANET路由器），也可能无法访问加密授权。
